basics.name: Fayaz Ahmad Sardar
basics.label: Agriculture Advisor and Language Officer
basics.summary: A qualified Agriculture Advisor and Language Officer with a vast experience in Community Development, Capacity Building, Agriculture, Marketing and Business. Fluent in Pashto, Dari, English, and Urdu.

work.name: Laghman PRT/ADT
work.summary: Established and maintained coordination with governmental and non-government organizations, strategic planning with DAIL Office, preparing module need assessment based and training plans and materials for Agriculture students.

work.name: IPCB-S International police coordination board Kabul Afghanistan
work.summary: Performed translations from English to Pashto/Dari of various documents, simultaneous translations in IPCB-S meetings.

work.name: BRAC Education Program for Afghanistan
work.summary: Prepared and implemented plans for concerned areas, supervised staff and schooling activities.
Provided improved seed to farmers, worked on the field to control plant disease, gave refresh courses to farmers.
